thread.title: Deepshikha does a Parveen Babi
thread.title_full: Deepshikha does a Parveen Babi - The Times of India

author: Neha Maheshwri
title: Deepshikha does a Parveen Babi
text:
Often people emulate their Bollywood icons. But in the case of Deepshikha Nagpal, it's her uncanny resemblance to late actress Parveen Babi that draws a lot of attention.
In fact, when she entered television, she got tagged as small screen's Parveen Babi. And now, after being in the industry for over two decades, she has decided to pay a homage to the Bollywood actress with a series of photographs, in which she poses like her. "My peers would call me Parveen Babi in college and that didn't change even after I entered the entertainment industry.
READ: Deepshikha and Kaishav decide to give their marriage another chance
My fellow actors would address me saying, 'Parveen Babi ki duplicate aa gayi'. The first film I was offered featured Rekhaji, which I couldn't do. When I met her, she told me that I looked like Babi.
Even Salman Khan would keep referring to me as her doppelganger during my stint in the Bigg Boss house. It has influenced me so much that I met photographer Jayesh Seth and told him that I would like to pay a tribute to the actress I resemble the most."
Deepshikha Nagpal: If I take it lying down then I'm a bechari, if I speak up, I'm a b**ch. Click Here! to know why she said this. Deepshikha Nagpal: Everyone hates Puneet Issar's chaddis. Read to know the reason why everyone hates his chaddis.
